data.title: Contextual Spell Check
data.slogan: Contextual spell correction using BERT (bidirectional representations)
data.description: This package currently focuses on Out of Vocabulary (OOV) word or non-word error (NWE) correction using BERT model. The idea of using BERT was to use the context when correcting NWE.
code_example: doc = nlp('Income was $9.4 milion compared to the prior year of $2.7 milion.')
print(doc._.outcome_spellCheck) #Income was $9.4 million compared to the prior year of $2.7 million.
data.author: Rajat Goel
